column1: '''Cambridge''' is a town in England, known for its '''University of Cambridge'''.
[[J.R.R. Tolkien]] is known to have visited Cambridge at least once in his youth, for a [[King Edward's School]] 1st XV football match against the [[Wikipedia:The Leys School
*[http://www.lotrplaza.com/showthread.php?77337-Tolkien-and-Cambridge-Simon-Cook Tolkien and Cambridge] by Simon Cook
